title: Proven Methodologies, Automated Excellence
text: Our platform codifies industry-leading frameworks into actionable workflows:

section.title: 5W2H Automation
section.content: Automated root cause analysis with dynamic What-Why-When-Where-Who-How-How Much templates for continuous improvement cycles.

section.title: SIPOC Optimization
section.content: AI-powered Suppliers-Inputs-Process-Outputs-Customers mapping with predictive bottleneck identification.
